    • Method Detail

      • changeStateOfUser

        public void changeStateOfUser(java.lang.String nick,
                              boolean available)
        Changes the state of the user given as a parameter. Each client can be either busy playing a game or available to be sent a game request.
        Parameters:
        nick - nick of the client
        available - new state of the client

      • deleteAllUsers

        public void deleteAllUsers()
        Deletes all the clients at once. This method is used when closing the window so when it is open again there are no users from the previous "action".

      • addNewOnlineUser

        public void addNewOnlineUser(java.lang.String nick)
        Creates a new online user and adds it to the list.
        Parameters:
        nick - nick of the new client that just got connected to the server

      • removeOnlineUser

        public void removeOnlineUser(java.lang.String nick)
        Removes a client from the list when they get disconnected from the server
        Parameters:
        nick - nick of the client that is going to be removed

      • createSendGameRequestButton

        private NickButton createSendGameRequestButton(java.lang.String nick)
        Creates a button used to send a game request to the appropriate client.
        Parameters:
        nick - nick of the client the game request will be sent to
        Returns:
        button used to send a game request to the client

      • sendGameRequest

        private void sendGameRequest(java.lang.String nick)
        Sends a game request to the client given as a parameter
        Parameters:
        nick - nick of the client the game request will be sent to

      • createNewActiveUserOnlineCircle

        private javafx.scene.shape.Circle createNewActiveUserOnlineCircle()
        Creates an "online" circle of an active client
        Returns:
        online circle of an active client

      • createNewActiveUserLabel

        private javafx.scene.control.Label createNewActiveUserLabel(java.lang.String nick)
        Creates a new label holding the client's nickname
        Parameters:
        nick - nickname of the client
        Returns:
        label holding the nickname of the client

      • disconnect

        private void disconnect()
        Disconnects the client from the server. This is used when the user wants to leave the server on purpose.

      • setNick

        public void setNick(java.lang.String nick)
        Sets nick of the client
        Parameters:
        nick - nick of the client

      • createDisconnectButton

        private javafx.scene.control.Button createDisconnectButton()
        Creates a button used fro disconnecting for the server. This is the button the user is supposed to click on when they want to leave the server.
        Returns:
        button disconnecting the client from the server

      • createNick

        private javafx.scene.control.Label createNick()
        Creates a nick of a new client.
        Returns:
        label holding the nick of the client

      • createTitle

        private javafx.scene.control.Label createTitle()
        Creates the title of the window (lobby)
        Returns:
        title of the window

      • createScrollPaneForUsers

        private javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane createScrollPaneForUsers()
        Creates a scroll-pane for all the users so the user can simply scroll down if the list of online clients is too long.
        Returns:
        scroll-pane of the list of clients
